title: Internal DATS provenance schema
description: The provenance information kept in DataMed. This schema is for internal use in DataMed and not to be implemented by repositories.

transformationFile.description: The DataMed transformation file describing the mapping between the original repository and DATS.

ingestMethod.description: The method used to ingest the dataset from the repository into DataMed.

ingestTarget.description: The location where the source files can be found, using the ingestMethod, to produce this DATS intance ingested in DataMed.

filePattern.description: A regular expression indicating the pattern of files considered during the ingestion process.

ingestTimestamp.description: A timestamp reporting when the ingestion occurred.
